snippet: The network reacted to the furor that erupted after it was revealed that its edit took George Zimmerman’s comments on Trayvon Martin’s race out of context.
abstract: The network reacted to the furor that erupted after it was revealed that its edit took George Zimmerman’s comments on Trayvon Martin’s race out of context.

headline.main: NBC Fires Producer of Misleading Zimmerman Tape
headline.print_headline: NBC Fires Clip Producer In Florida Shooting Case
